item.title: Decoding the Vatican: Key Terms in the Papal Transition
item.description: From conclave to “camerlengo,” here’s what to know about the words and phrases that guide the process after a pope dies.

item.title: Ukraine Pinning War Hopes on Expanded Drone Program
item.description: With uncertainty looming over cease-fire talks and U.S. support, the Ukrainian military is relying more than ever on domestically produced drones.

item.title: American Children Sent to Honduras, and A.I. on the Battlefield
item.description: Plus, teaching student athletes how to go viral.

item.title: Russia’s Putin Thanks Kim for North Korean Troops Fighting in Kursk
item.description: North Korea’s leader, Kim Jong-un, ordered a monument for the “heroic” soldiers killed in Russia’s war against Ukraine, as Moscow and Pyongyang make f...

item.title: Kurdish Distrust of Syria’s New Government Runs Deep
item.description: The Kurdish-led force that runs northeast Syria has agreed to integrate into a new national army, but some of its supporters remain wary.
